name: cilkre
description:
Ever heard of a button clicking game?

I think you do. What about a button clicking game, but with puzzles?

Well, here it is.

In cilkre, you have to press buttons, to get to the end of a level.

Sometimes, there will be absolutely no logic involved. Just try to click on one of them. Maybe something will happen. Maybe not.

All I can say for now is: have fun :)

(Yes, it has the most simple graphics you can get, but hey, there's puzzle involved :D)
